content:
We are running dataverse v. 5.12.1 build 1122-cf90431 in centos 9. The script 'scripts/backup/run_backup' is tested for Centos 7. Do you have a better way to backup our dataverse installation that this script?
Thanks in advance.

content: I'm pretty sure we still use that script for Harvard Dataverse. I'd be happy to hear what's working for other people.
@AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves you might want to ask on https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community as well.
